channel.title: Z92's alcher :)
channel.description:
*notes* Hi. Use this in Games room (No randoms.). Have notes UNDER the Alch spell. I have gotten from 60 magic to 94 magic with this with no ban, therefor dont rant about it being "Nooby" or along those lines, I made it to be simple (and therefor undetectable as a ninja :eek: .). A thanks if you use it would encourage me to release another of my homemade scripts. 8)
[code] program alcher; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} var e,h,xa,ya,t :integer;
begin
t:= strtoint(Readln('How many do you want to Alch?')) writeln('Press alt+s to start.') repeat begin writeln('started!') xa:= 661+random(6) ya:= 327+random(6) DisguiseScar('Winamp'); BenMouse:= False; MouseSpeed:=10+random(10); wait(175+random(175)) Mouse(xa, ya, 0, 0,true); for e := 1 to t do begin h:=51 wait(50+random(100)) holdmouse(xa,ya,true) wait(169+random(366)) wait(100+random(100)) releasemouse(xa,ya,true) wait(257+random(343)) wait(1510+random(1093)) wait(100+random(100)) holdmouse(xa,ya,true) wait(278+random(324)) wait(50+random(100)) wait(50+random(100))
releasemouse(xa,ya,true) wait(100+random(100)) wait(100+random(100)) holdmouse(xa,ya,true) wait(255+random(337))
releasemouse(xa,ya,true) wait(454+random(367)) wait(50+random(100)) wait(50+random(100)) wait(50+random(100)) wait(50+random(100)) wait(2000+random(1091)) holdmouse(xa,ya,true) wait(223+random(365))
releasemouse(xa,ya,true)
end; end; wait(12+random(7))
until(h=5) writeln('Successfully alched ' + IntToStr(t) + ' item(s)!!') Writeln('Total XP earned: '+FloatToStr(t * 65)); Writeln('Thanks for using z92Â´s simple high alcher.');
end.
[/code]

item.title: Z92's alcher :)
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

some people have thier hotkeys different, and i dont get why every1 has autoalchers, cause more and more people are using the “num 5” method meaning they dont move their mouse. Im just gonna make an auto clicker that randomly talks and takes breaks!

Read full topic

item.title: Z92's alcher :)
item.dc:creator: @mod_joery joery
item.description:
@mod_joery wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:3, topic:6298”]It is slightly nooby and you could have coded it better, but since it works and it’s undetectable, that’s pretty good.

Why did you use a begin after repeat? You don’t have to have one after that in a repeat loop. And you also said, press Alt+S to start the script, but it starts automatically when you run the script lol. :)[/quote]

Ehm u could press “CTRL + ALT + R” To run the script right ?
And ehm to stop is CTRL + ALT + S" so when i want to stop it start agen couse of the ALT + S

Read full topic

item.title: Z92's alcher :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

It is slightly nooby and you could have coded it better, but since it works and it’s undetectable, that’s pretty good.

Why did you use a begin after repeat? You don’t have to have one after that in a repeat loop. And you also said, press Alt+S to start the script, but it starts automatically when you run the script lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Z92's alcher :)
item.dc:creator: @z92 z92
item.description:
@z92 wrote:

notes
Hi. Use this in Games room (No randoms.).
Have notes UNDER the Alch spell.
I have gotten from 60 magic to 94 magic with this with no ban, therefor dont rant about it being “Nooby” or along those lines, I made it to be simple (and therefor undetectable as a ninja :eek: .).
A thanks if you use it would encourage me to release another of my homemade scripts. 8)

program alcher;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
var e,h,xa,ya,t :integer;


begin

t:= strtoint(Readln('How many do you want to Alch?'))
writeln('Press alt+s to start.')
repeat
begin
writeln('started!')
  xa:= 661+random(6)
  ya:= 327+random(6)
  DisguiseScar('Winamp');
    BenMouse:= False;
  MouseSpeed:=10+random(10);
  wait(175+random(175))
  Mouse(xa, ya, 0, 0,true);
  for e := 1 to t do
 begin
  h:=51
  wait(50+random(100))
holdmouse(xa,ya,true)
  wait(169+random(366))
  wait(100+random(100))
  releasemouse(xa,ya,true)
  wait(257+random(343))
          wait(1510+random(1093))
           wait(100+random(100))
  holdmouse(xa,ya,true)
  wait(278+random(324))
   wait(50+random(100))
     wait(50+random(100))

  releasemouse(xa,ya,true)
        wait(100+random(100))
            wait(100+random(100))
  holdmouse(xa,ya,true)
  wait(255+random(337))


  releasemouse(xa,ya,true)
  wait(454+random(367))
   wait(50+random(100))
    wait(50+random(100))
     wait(50+random(100))
      wait(50+random(100))
           wait(2000+random(1091))
  holdmouse(xa,ya,true)
  wait(223+random(365))

  releasemouse(xa,ya,true)

 end;
end;
wait(12+random(7))

until(h=5)
writeln('Successfully alched ' + IntToStr(t) + ' item(s)!!')
Writeln('Total XP earned: '+FloatToStr(t  * 65));
Writeln('Thanks for using z92Â´s simple high alcher.');

end.

Read full topic
